Resource.item: Models
Static model:
The simplest type of model. Answers are fixed, but you can sort their visualization at random.
Self-assessment test

It will be possible to choose libraries from which select questions to present to the user. Once answered every question, the user will be able to see corrections ( in case of automatically evaluable questions) and, possibly suggestions about the knowledge he/she lacks or custom texts, inserted by the creator of the question.
Questions library:
Questions added to a library can be used to quickly create several types of model.
Model's model:

Permette di creare un modello statico e pubblico di questionario (con impostazioni di base, domande, pagine, ecc): altri gestori del servizio potranno utilizzare tale modello (con le relative impostazioni) per creare dei questionari personalizzati.
Random model:
It will be possible to select how many questions, for each difficulty level and available library, will be presented to the user. To every user will be displayed a different set of questions.
SELECT THE TYPE OF MODEL BY CLICKING "CHOOSE"
Poll:
Like the static model, but you can not automatically evaluate answers.

The model ca be used by:
ATTENTION: by pressing "Create" the model will be saved. Once entered, go to the questionnaire list and click the red button (that will become green) next to the model in order to enable compilation.
GENERAL
General section, where you can add the basilar information about the model.
ADMINISTERING METHOD
In this section choose the methods by which users will answer the model questions.
RECIPIENTS
In this section it is possible to choose users to whom dispatch the model.
